i have several tapeworms

my name is flu. i'm an unexplainable gendervoid entity. i really like yume nikki fangames (especially .flow) and rpgmaker horror games, i also like vocaloid, machine girl, lsd dream emulator, madoka magica, portal, anime cons, weirdcore, komaedalovemail, sengoku turb, tumblr drama from 2012-2016, scp foundation, moomin, and horror stuff in general. more info about me is here.

dni if proship or you're not into rpgmaker horror games (current mutuals okay) + more things unlisted

before you follow, mind that i delete my tweets often, am very traumatized + mentally ill, i am critical of my interests, tell me if i do anything wrong or follow anyone bad, and i use blocklists.

O_o.
